DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the amount of drug available in the body when given to healthy participants as two different formulations with or without a meal. In addition, this study will evaluate how much of the drug gets into the blood stream and how long the body takes to get rid of it. Information about any side effects that may occur will also be collected. Each participant will receive a total of five different treatments. Each treatment is given by mouth, once a day. The treatment period lasts for five consecutive days.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Prasugrel in Healthy Participants
DOC.detailed_description: The reference formulation is an orally disintegrating tablet without Magnasweet® (ODT1) and the test formulation is an orally disintegrating tablet containing Magnasweet® (ODT2).
DOC.criteria: Body mass index (BMI) of 18.5 to 32.0 kilograms per square meter (kg/m^2) No known allergies to Prasugrel or related compound No regular alcohol intake greater than 21 units per week for males or 14 units per week for females
